entry.title: Radiohead - The National Anthem (Live at South Park, Oxford, 2001)

media:group.media:title: Radiohead - The National Anthem (Live at South Park, Oxford, 2001)
media:group.media:description:
Recorded live at South Park, Oxford on 7th July 2001.
The T-shirts at this show used a design specially gifted to us by the more famous South Park namesake. We are re-issuing them for a limited time - get yours HERE: https://smarturl.it/w.a.s.t.e Like everything from the original show, all proceeds will go to a deserved cause and this time it will be: https://www.safepassage.org.uk
Browse through the KID A MNESIA exhibition and visit the gift shop: https://kida-mnesia.com KID A MNESIA is out now: https://radiohead.ffm.to/kid-a-mnesia

entry.title: KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION - OFFICIAL TRAILER

media:group.media:title: KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION - OFFICIAL TRAILER
media:group.media:description:
The KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION is now open...entry is free. Download for PlayStation 5, PC and Mac at https://kida-mnesia.com
Radiohead and Epic Games Publishing are proud to present KID A MNESIA EXHIBITION: an upside-down digital/analogue universe created from original artwork by Thom Yorke and Stanley Donwood and sound design by Nigel Godrich to commemorate 21 years of Radiohead’s Kid A and Amnesiac albums.
For PC & Mac: https://www.epicgames.com/store/p/kid-a-mnesia-exhibition For PlayStation 5: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10003085/
Triple album ‘KID A MNESIA’ is out now via XL Recordings: https://radiohead.ffm.to/kid-a-mnesia

entry.title: Thom Yorke and Stanley Donwood in conversation for Christie's

media:group.media:title: Thom Yorke and Stanley Donwood in conversation for Christie's
media:group.media:description:
Thom and Stanley talk about their work together and about Stanley's paintings from Kid A, auctioning at Christie's from now until the 19th September 2021. https://onlineonly.christies.com/s/first-open-post-war-contemporary-art-online/lots/1869
The six paintings on auction will be open to public view at Christie's London from the 9th - 15h October, displayed alongside a collection of sketches and other works by Stanley and Thom. Entrance is free and viewing times are:
Saturday, 9 October, 12-5pm Sunday, 10 October, 12-5pm Monday, 11 October, 9-5pm Tuesday, 12 October, 9-5pm Wednesday, 13 October, 9-5pm Thursday, 14 October, 9-5pm Friday, 15 October, 9-5pm
https://kida-mnesia.com
